I'm not very tech savvy this is the only launcher I've tried. But I love it. I can change the look of my screen easily. I have some vision problems and can change the size of icons and their names to be more easily seen. Thanks Nova!
Thus is spectacular I am a senior with vision problems with Nova I can now adjust my apps size and layout and with an adjustment no more getting lost! Thank you Nova!

I have tried dozens of launchers in search of one that has icons and text that can be scaled up making it accessible to those who are visually impaired and that also includes notification badges on the screen for missed IM's. I have found that all that provide the ability to enlarge icons and text require payment for this feature. I believe this is an effort to take advantage of the visually impaired community. Therefore every launcher that I have tried that has the ability to enlarge icons but only if you are willing to pay extra for this feature will be receiving only one star from me and I have tried most every launcher in the PlayStore. I will go through each and every one that I have tried that has this feature available but only if you are willing to pay extra for it and they will be receiving only one star for lack of accessibility and what I believe is a bias towards the visually impaired community and an attempt to profiteer

Nice way to maintain same feel on phones from different manufacturers. Also more flexible than built-in launchers. For my dad I also used it to simplify his phone usage. The pro version is better than all the launchers designed for the elderly or visually impaired. Thanks!

app_name: OfficeSuite - Word docs- Excel sheets- PDF files
review_text: I am a totally blind user and I use TalkBack Android's integrated screenreading software to read what is on the screen. I was surprised and dismayed to discover that OfficeSuite is not at all compatible with the TalkBack screenreader surprised given the fact that other apps from the same developers are completely TalkBack friendly. In OfficeSuite TalkBack will not read any document of any filetype making it impossible for me to read navigate through or edit documents. Also there are a lot of unlabelled buttons which TalkBack cannot identify thus it is impossible to know what said buttons do. Please make the app more TalkBack compatible and I will adjust my rating accordingly.
With the latest upgrade my typing field in messaging is set to a grey background and blue letters. I'm sending you the bill when I get glasses due to eyestrain.

*******stupid! People who have extremely poor sight through illness can't even get in!!!!!!!! I'd give you minus one thousand stars if it were possible! Your captcha needs to be changed as sight impaired people can't see what they are clicking.. Uninstalling
Im visually impaired and i cant read any thing on peoples profiles without geting a massive headache please add bold text or make it size 16

it is good that these kind of apps do exist but I feel personally as a visually impaired person this app is very visual the questions are based on pictures and therefore quite exclusive in nature therefore I feel if there are certain improvements made it would be wonderful.
App not accessible blind persons
not at all blind friendly and trying to report a complain there is no option to have a direct Ox or anything very poor and I am losing my money because of this

make accessible for blind 1st show list off car and next gove ride now and ride later once click ride now button car name total amount payment mode next confirm Button it has to search next show driver car detail thank you
It is not accessible for blind people Now a days it is troubling. Not good. Old vergin was very good.

This application is not compatible with screen reader in Android version 10 and violet International accessibility law please resolve the issue as soon as possible blind people cannot be used this application easily

I ha ve been using the Ola app for some time now. Had mailed a feedback earlier on mail but it bounced. I find the app largely useful however there are a couple of major issues that need to be fixed. First in Delhi at least I have observed that you won't get a cab after 9 30 at night very often. Same is the case during early morning too. Then during day time the peak rate gets far too high so unless there are worthwhile offers I look at other apps Uber has a lot more cabs at night...... The 2nd is an accessibility related issue. I am a blind person using my phone with Google's TalkBack screen reader. The Ola app is largely accessible but the driver rating section is not at all accessible. The different ratings are not read out by TalkBack one has to do a random tap and hope for the best. Hopefully these issues will be fixed pretty soon.

With talkback and TTS applications this ap should be accessible. Please label all unlabeled buttons and add a accessibility API in your core code. Tell how many passengers can travel in different cab while booking. It is not easy for a blind person to book cab independently. Llease make this app accessible. Using samsung galaxy A7.
This app should have a dark mode option. Dark Mode Option is required for Senior Citizens. and low vision person

Reminder 1 This application should have dark mode option. Because it is very beneficial for low vision person and senior citizens. Now a days all apps like Facebook Whatsapp Twitter have this option so you are requested to provide dark mode option.

We visually impaired use ola with screen reader. This updated app sucks. Very difficult to book apply promo or rate the driver. Not accessible for us. Loved the previous versions. 1 star for the updates.
application isn't fully accessible with talkback screen reading software
Accessibility TalkBack not supported Everything is good
App should be made accessible to visually challenged users. Why not ola when rival uber is doing perfectly?
There is no darkmode or nightmode option available for better viewing of visually challenged persons...... Pls do the needful for as soon as possible to makeover ur apps for big thums u[
I am a visually impaired. I was able too book cab in earlier version. But this time it seams that this app does not complied with Google accessibility guidelines.
You people are just disgusting you keep updating the ap but never bother to fix accessibility bugsfor visually impaired users
Not proper accessible for visually impaired person Please improve that area
Application is not accessible to visually impaired person like me
This application is not accessible for visually impaired people so please you must fix or box as soon as possible
I love this app properly work but this application useful visually impaired so completely make this app

app_name: Opera News: Breaking Local & US Headlines
review_text: After the latest update things became worse. I cannot access messages such as reply to my opinion on topics. Introduce dark mode please. Save your readers from eye strain. Uploading videos is still difficult. Look into it.

I changed my review to a positive one. If you've purchased Ox Dictionary app before they introduced the subscription model then you're lucky. If not good luck paying for it monthly. And why 4 stars? The app is very good. But the dark theme of the app is bad and I hope they'll improve it the future. As of now the dark theme looks low effort. I have sensitive eyes so a good dark theme would do wonders. But for the rest I really like it.

One of the best applications Little bit annoyed also because it is not accessible I have purchased the application but thinking to uninstall it as being a visually challenged person it is of no use to me

Htc Evoshift 4g. Before the last update everything was well if not completely accessible for the blind the majority was. Now its not. FIX IT PLEASE and I'll give it 5 stars again. None of the buttons are labeled...

2 they have changed it so much it cannot be used by a legally blind person and but ask you to sign up or sign in and does not take your signature or your password so I am unloading it and going to let somebody else deal with it have a good day
I used to love pandora. But now its stops playing after just one song. And as a blind person I constantly ask my daughter to quit pandora and get back on. Please fixx !!!
So many ads.. and wow I do not want that new UI. Talk about blind at night. Maybe if it has a dark theme
Although the main screen is accessable the settings aren't. Because these settings control privacy blind users who care about their data should avoid this app.
I love the app but Pandora should make a dark mode so that you don't blind yourself when you open it at night.

An easier access 'quit' button would be nice. I have my phone in a car dock while using Pandora and it would be nice to have night colors so it doesn't blind me while driving at night. Other than that I love it! Pandora One subscription is worth it too!

I will start by saying accessibility is completely broken in iOS if you happen to be a blind voice over user. However we're not talking about iOS are we? We're talking about android. On the android platform with talkback this app currently works absolutely perfectly. Even in the most recent update things didn't break in the least. That is impressive! This is yet another reason why I am very rapidly growing away from the IOS platform. On android with talkback it just simply works! No hassle whatsoever.

Thank you for updating the dark theme as well. For i have a genetic eye disease that affects the dilation/constriction of the pupil. Which can causing temporary to permenant blindness. Occular assistance like this with a functionable switch allowing on and off should be readily available for all sites. Thank you for the app update. Lets rock!

Pandora has really improved this app over the last year! It's a little confusing trying to find 'actual' stations that are not just 10 or 15 songs. The added feature of night mode was a HUGE help for those of us with light sensitivity issues!

Generally I love Pandora the adverts have become more intrusive but I understand that's what you get for free and that's okay. For some reason the tablet version no longer has the sleep timer which is still on the phone version ??? Strange now I have to use an external sleep timer at nights pity. Update - timer implemented thank you ! Another suggestion could you allow pinch zoom on the 'about' text ? My old eyes can't read the text. Update -new version is crashing more often after restarting after sleep timer. Last night so bad it killed the tablets touch screen so I had to struggle to even reboot !!
Nice free version paid version works better but neither version is screen reader compatible 100% what a gave it five star but because it's not screen reader compatible 100%

The one music app that I have learned to navigate very well. Most apps r not always easy to learn how to navigate very wellk with the talk vack settings for the blind/visually impaired Pandora does a wonderful job. So thanks Pandora for working great with screen readers!!!!

I have had one unique experience with Pandora. The only thing is I am legally blind and use TalkBack and the problem I'm running into is that when I go to add a song to a playlist for some reason it is not reading me the list of playlists to add a song to and I'd like to know what I'm adding to before I tap on it. What is going on here?

Absolutely love this app I use it quite often I have a visual disability I have no problems using this app anything I touch it tells me what I'm touching it tells me the songs that are playing and it's easy to stream.

This new update is crap. I use it on my roku to fall asleep to and it's bright as anything now. It plays right away. I'll mute my tv to avoid that since now the music blares and now it cuts through the mute of the tv which shouldn't be happening. Also the menu is lame. It's not easy to navigate. It's no longer in big print super small and at the top of the screen so for someone who's visually impaired such as myself it's extremely difficult to see from far away. Epic fail Pandora. Looks like I'm switching to Spotify. Much easier.
The app could be more accessible to blind people

Great app overall. Just does everything I want it to be. One thing glaring thing I want it to have tho : DARK MODE!!! Because I swear to God PayPal is one of the brightest UI in one of the major apps still now in 2021. Come on it's 2021 now. Dark Mode should be default now and developers should be building out features about it now since iOS 13 or Android 10's Platform-wide Dark Mode support. Can we have it soon enough? We businesses have some business and finances to do at night too. So it'll be so helpful if PayPal won't blind us at night and take care of our eyes. Please forward this to the Product Team and get it implemented this year!!

I am legally blind and I found the app extremely easy to understand! I will begin to use this app for all of my transactions. I especially appreciated how they tell you about the fee you will be charged and it is plain to see or you can opt out of the fee and make another choice. this is truly the way to go! ARB 3-15-19
@PayPal please bring back *DeepBlue Background. This Update With white is causing great eye strain.
Easy to use interface less eye strain during the night. Quick and fluid performance even on slow phones.
The new interface is very easy on the eyes. Especially with me having migraines with light sensitivity

Completely full of BUGS. 1 Upload document doesn't work in the resolution center. 2. 'Response Required' doesn't work so a buyer cannot accept an offer for resolution. 3. Call Us option button does work. It just reloads the same page. 4. The chat box does not conform to the text size and the send button isn't visible. This makes the app useless and descrimatory as low-vision people are unable to use it. 5. Many others

This app is an accessibility nightmare. I'm blind so I can't do the visual verifications. But I have my text size turned up so I don't have to use my screen reader all the time and if you turn your text size up it makes it impossible to submit the audio verification. Plus click a notification log in have my spouse do the verification... The notification takes me to a page that just says 'Whoever sent you $X!' And I can't do anything with it. Click back app closes. Have to do it all over.

😡WHAT HAPPEN TO THE 👀EYE AND ⚡BATTERY FRIENDLY 🖤DARK THEME MODE THAT SAVES EYE AND BATTERY HEALTH??? -😥PLEASE PUT IT BACK-I DONT EVEN USE THE APP ANY MORE BECAUSE THE WHITE SCREENS 😎HURT MY PHOTO SENSITIVE EYES!☃ *msmb
It's a great app everything I need setup is really easy it's not complicated. I wish there was a dark mode because I have sensitive eyes overall It's very secure too.

Paypal updated last night mid transaction. I can no longer see any pending payments or details of the payment requests sent to customers! How are we meant to keep track of things? Please fix asap. Also blue screen is very difficult to read... have u thought about people with vision impairments?
app makers do not respond to enquiries. or requests. we need dark theme for the screen people with visual impairement

It is convenient to have this app on my phone. It lets me know when money is received and it's easy to send money to friends quickly. However as a visually impaired person I find the bright white background and grayish print to be difficult to read.. I never know if what I intended to do actually happens until it happens. Very typical for many apps.
easy to use well designed and accessible to the visually impaired a great way of managing money.
It's OK but not very good for color blind people such as myself.

Mostly Enjoyable with one major flaw for me: accessibility. From what I can tell there is no option to assist those of us with colorblindness I have red-green colorblindness and have difficulty differentiating certain colors/shades. A simple option like having the name of the color from the pallette display when you hover the S Pen over it would do wonders in alleviating this issue. I will be using another drawing app until such a feature is implemented.

app_name: Period Tracker - Period Calendar Ovulation Tracker
review_text: Would like to see voice assistant for the visually impaired. Highest accuracy of all the apps I've tried. Discreet can see history great tracking everything pain weight moods symptoms

review_text: Sometimes it causes my note 3 stall and reboot. Fix that and add a different background option that does not affect visually impaired get 5 *'s!

Immediately impressed how easy and details were fixed in my home pics! I'm legally blind but the little I can see was so great! Thanks! Especially for free and fast install of app and no annoying free trial and monthly membership interruptions. I was having bad day and it turned good. 🤗
Add Dark Mode when we click on save we will become blind using your app!!!!
I don't know why..long time ago im use this app so far so good but now this app get blind of colour unable to distinguish between white or black

This is not the simple app most others are but its simple to use! Imagination is the only limit the only suggestions I would have is make it more friendly for color blind people. List the colors in writing so blue and purple yellow and orange etc. Don't get confused!!!!!!

I used to love Pinterest but now I cannot read it as it has white text on a black background and I cannot read this it gives me eye strain I don't know how to change this there doesn't appear to be be a way to change it back to the black text on a white background

Dark theme not available in settings. This is really annoying as I check out this app when I can't sleep and don't enjoy the eye strain even with my backlight turned right down. If it had dark theme is rate it 5*

Edited to add that I saw another review that said using the blue light filter caused the same problems. Same for me. While blue light filter is running Pinterest app completely stops working. Hopefully this gets fixed soon because I use the filter for eye strain and for night time. Fixed after recent update.

Honestly i like this app a lot but i wish it had a night version with the background being black or darker so as to not cause too much eye strain..if you could add that i would definitely give it a 5 star

the background should have an optional blackground so that the print pix & videos can be seen with less eye strain. please.

Can you add night mode option? It's so hard to use this app at night because of the white background. It's hurting my eyes and I'm pretty sure some of you too due to light sensitivity.
If it had a night mode I'd use the app far more my reason for not being .on it as much as I would like to is my light sensitivity disability.

2017- Now that I have low vision and have yet to find solutions to my Pinterest problems my visitsto the site are quite infrequent. 2016-Totally dissapointed it's soo frustrating and annoying!! The constant barrage of ads for things items I have never ever had an interest in...trying to get an ad free version but no help from Pinterest. Also getting pins in another language and not able to translate them is another major annoyance. 2015-I am totally addicted to Pinterest and it still gets 5 stars from me! I can't wait to try some of the new things that Pinterest will allow you to do like send whole boards to friends and pinning from everywhere! 8/16/14 Pinterest is not only exciting and tons of fun it also opens your mind to new information people places and things!!!!!
Frustrating that I'm not able to continue flipping they the large images it eventually always gets stuck. I have low vision and this is important for me.

I hate the new view in Android! I already have a problem with small prints on the mobile phone and Pinterest made everything smaller on the Oct 3. Now I can barely see the tiny boxes with ther pictures on. What's up Pinterest! Bring the old version back it's way better. You made it worst for middle aged folks that are starting to be near sighted.
the one thing I'm not fond of is when i hover over a picture it turns a darker shade.i wish i could hover over to make the picture bigger..i have old eyes.

Oh! To have my recipes as close as my iPad or phone be able to enlarge for these 80 year old eyes to see & no more stacks of printed recipes...thank you Pinterest! My granddaughter is so proud that I'm using it! She's my brainy guide to conquer this brave new tech world l am blessed!

This app is not accessible for the blind. It is somewhat accessible on the computer (screen reader will read the text under the picture allowing for me to use someone's eyes to describe the picture itself) just not on Android - which all that is needed it a simple checkmark in the code.

I think it's okay. The latest update is super annoying though. There's no option for dark mode and I have super sensitive eyes so sometimes I'll have to turn my brightness all the way down just to make it bearable. Also please get rid of those annoying videos. This isn't TikTok. Lastly I really miss the feature where you can click on your groups at the top. Made it wayyyy easier to find new ideas. Once this app gets rid off the new update I'll change it to 5 stars
I enjoy this app from wallpapers information & creative ideas. How about a dark theme for ppl with sensitive eyes please?
The new updates are annoying. I'm not 105 with eyesight problems. I don't need my font to be huge when I'm pinning things.

I have found too much that I like and love. My brain is frozen and doesn't know where to go next. So many things I want to do now. Was hard to start building my boards too me some time to peck my way through. Wish there was a left handed access. I keep taping places i dont want. No access for vision impairment. Otherwise would have loved it.

I love this app but please bring back the ability to search by boards. I want to be able to put in a word and not just be able to look for pins but also boards with it. I use my phone most of the time due to vision issues so the removal of this feature from the app has been a massive loss for me

Do not like how the app has been changed. I like it better when my post were liked and share was separate instead of being mixed with everything else's post and it makes it hard for people with vision problems to fine what everyone liked

Disappointing that I can't even find any help topics about accessibility options within the app to increase font size. Would have loved to have used this on the go with my phone. You'd think a company with so many users would have by now considered the needs of those with visual impairments.
But could it be bigger? Maybe the option for single column instead of two for the visually challenged? Otherwise sooooo glad there is an app now and very streamlined and sleek at that.
App is annoying. Can't find what I want. Can't expand pictures which is unacceptable for visually impaired. Annoying ads everywhere. Uninstalled in 24 hours.
It's a good app but it does not allow visually impaired to make larger to be able to see. I strain so much on the app that I end up with a headache. Not that worth it!
Would give 5 stars if it did not shut down all the time. Big problem. Also please make print bigger for visually impaired. I love this app and would spend more time if it worked properly.
I'm visually impaired it's not really accessible this app is it? It would be great if you could zoom in on the photos

It'd be absolutely fantastic if you took the visually impaired into consideration. I have to go to each pins website (if there is one available) to use zoom just to see what it is I'm looking at or reading. Please add zoom.
How about a black theme that's easy on the eyes? Also a mode that shows 1 .pin per page would be nice for the visually impaired. I love Pinterest .just can't use it cuz I have bad eyes.
ur phone needs to have talk back enabled for the app to open people

Can't sign in at all anymore. Server error. No problem logging in from the same device on any browser or a PS4. Between this and the Store redesign which is an accessibility nightmare (no text what an age to be visually impaired in) I think I'm done with Sony after a couple of decades of good times.

This is a great app other than the fact that the buttons need to be labeled for a visually impaired gamer you can still see to play ps3 / ps4 however can't use a phone well enough. Please remove these buttons with the next update. You can check Google's accessibility development guidelines.

The new font in the community is horrific. It causes eye strain and headaches bc there is too much white not enough contrast and the letter in the font look too similar to each other (very little difference between C and G etc). In addition the way it displays gestational age is confusing. Eveyone else counts the first day of the week as day 0. BBC displays is as day 1 misleading you into thinking you're a day farther along than you are.

Changed the font recently to something basically unreadable. I can't use the app for more than a few minutes before I feel eye strain. The app is also very slow since the update. I used to spend quite a bit of time on this app but not anymore.

Ce lecteur de code barre très sensible détecte les codes barres de manière surprenante qualité indéniable pour les utilisateurs de TalkBack. Très utile dans le quotidien d'un aveugle pour qui l'emplacement du code barre est des plus aléatoire.
Sorry I'm trouble having trouble reading the survey but you guys have been great That's for sure I'm almost blind so I'm having trouble with the survey sorry

Thanks for nothing. Now I can't read the text in the menu & home descriptions because some made the text too lite of a shade of grey. This is not fair to visually impaired folks. So now this app does not work for me.
No option for changing the font size. Getting blind slowly because of the tiny font. If it continues like this I'll have to send my medical bills to Reddit.
Love the app but would really love it if there was an option to change text size. I'm blind in one eye and my good eye can get tired trying to see the text.

I love night mode so when the new update was released I was overjoyed. The app now runs in a 'dead of the night mode' my default on all devices. It's wonderfully dark and the decreased usage also helps with eye strain!

Not sure if my previous comment is still relevant but I've dropped my rating: this app is constantly crashing. I'm on a Note 3. No other apps crash. Previous comment: It seems that the lettering for the comments in the inbox are all white and stretched out as opposed to blue and tighter spaced and it's causing real eye strain. The blue was perfect and how it went from bolded to not after reading a reply was helpful. Now it's incredibly hard to tell between visited and unvisited comments with the thread title and its contents being white.

Biggest issue for me is the bright blue bar (or whatever colour the subreddit is set to) appearing at the top of the images and individual subreddits for nighttime mode. Only seems to stay dark on the front page... Until you look at an image. Without a properly functioning nighttime mode I may not be able to use this because of eye strain and I'm sure many others are put off by this as well.

I have a few issues with the app: 1) I find it extremely laggy and it seems to eat the phone battery fast so definitely is suboptimal. 2) Font sizes. The app uses system font sizes that are too tiny even with the largest system fonts so it causes an eye strain. 3) Can't select a text to quote in reply

I love the app. Very convient way to view Reddit. I have a suggestion with the last update the print is much smaller. This has created an eye strain problem for myself. My suggestion is to have a font size setting within the app itself.
Used to be perfect. But now dark mode is only available at night? I cant switch it on and off ever its locked. I have light sensitivity so its hard to look at it now. Please fix!

Unnecessary bloated app that works better on Web broswers than as an app! No pinch and Zoom support App will not function if system text size is set to large....so anyone with low vision is just kicked to the curb w/ this app. Meanwhile those functions work fine w/ Reddit on my tabket's Chrome or other browser. Come on Reddit!
I'm so use to Reddit is fun app where I can turn on night mode and not blind my self every time I use Reddit. Other then blinding my already light sensitive eyes it's alright nothing special
Night mode is broken. It makes the whole app just turn black. Please fix .this. I have fairly sensitive eyes.
No vision impairment settings Can't adjust text size

I have a large phone screen and they fill about half the screen. The rest is blank white space. Use bolder font to avoid eye strain. Calculators don't need to look pretty they need to be functional. I've used calculators all my life mostly small pocket size my fingers can fly when working but not on this one. I may need to look for another.
Not accessible with TalkBack When I press the number key once Then the same number is automatically typed twice.

Works great. Visually easy on the eyes. Also easier to see for those wfor those who have vision problems.

The color scheme in food log is extremely uncomfortable for me as im unable to focus and the colors diverge into one shade especially in the nutrient intake summary bar.
very nice app i have been using it for a while but not built for people that are color blind

Please revert back to the previous patch this is really frustrating considering how far I've gotten with my weight loss

Weight management was the only reason why samsung health was better than apple health... The removal of the function so uncalled for and unnecessary... And the colours of the nutrient intake summery??? WHY??? IS THIS JUST TO BULLY PEOPLE WITH COLOUR BLINDNESS???

You changed it from being great on my phone to its large display for my vision impairment to now its terrible I'll be looking for another health app change is not always good in fact Samsung is getting so bad I'll probably change to an IPhone

I love Skype. It is the only way I have to communicate with some of my friends. However this new update added a bunch of irrelevant stuff that was more annoying than anything else. (Seriously I liked the old color scheme. I'm color blind and have a lot of trouble seeing the words against some of the color options that my friends have.) My biggest issue is that on my Samsung Galaxy S8 my enter key stopped working on Skype with this new update. As I'm sure you can tell I use my enter key a lot and since I also use skype mobile for some work stuff as well I'm sure you can understand my issue with not being able to break up my paragraphs. My partner has a Samsung Galaxy S6 and is now having the same issue with the enter key on this update. Please fix this and I will raise this back to five stars.

review_text: Hey dear developer first of all thank you so much for providing this wonderful awesome amazing and fantastic platform. just I have humble request to tell you is kindly improve the messaging feature and makes it easy as well WhatsApp and Facebook messenger so that it can be easily explored by blind and visually impaired people. Because exploring messaging feature of Skype with talk back and screen reader it is very difficult. I hope you will work on this feedback. thanks in advance...

It's really frustrating as a blind user who uses 'talkback' to find that sloppy programmers haven't bothered to label graphic buttons so instead of announcing something meaniful like 'call' it simply says 'button' so you don't knpw what it does tried to notify them using the email on this page but comes back as an unmonitored address helpful... not come on guys make it accessible please!!!
This app is not working properly in windows 10 for blind and visually impaired

Update: New UI is a steaming pile of trash that looks like it's lifted straight put of a crappy knockoff iMessenger. Please either undo this disaster or at least give us the option to go back to the old UI. Randomly crashes alot signs me out for no good reason occasionally decides to hide messages doesn't always notify me of new messages crashes alot when answering calls and is not color-blind friendly as the little status icons are hard to make out. But at least I can sometimes kind of use it to talk to my friends.

My god why did you think this new update was a good idea? I have a lot of critiques for the new aperence one of wich is the issue i had with the old versions but there is still no way to increase font size. Im on my phone alot and being able to increase the size slightly would help with eye strain. More color options or a costomizable color option vecause the current one really are not working for me. The. Theres the actual chat issuse. You can no longer save or share images that are shared even though there are options for it they just never work and i have yet to find a way to change that. Pressing the enter key now just closes out of the key board? Not really sure why you added that? Now theres no way to put partitions in long messages. Also the little smiles dont move in when your picking them out and i perzonally dont have the order memorized making it really hard to tell what your actually choosing. Honestly if any company learned somthing from tge uproar with the release of windows 8 its that shouldnt *completely* change the way somthing is set up or looks all at once. No one wants to completly relearn how to use something. ALSO how do i turn of the vibration on notification?! I cant fund anything anywhere for it??? Really if you put somthing in like that there needs to be a way to turn it off and your 'tutorial' things you needed to clear with the new update dis nothing to help explain the new changes. Bottom line if i wanted messaging app that looked and worked like this i would be using face book mesanger. Your apeal was NOT being like FB messenger. Emphasis on the was.

Was fine until the devs tried to turn it into Snapchat. I don't use Snapchat I don't want Snapchat. You can no longer see who is online the text bubbles take up so much room you can only see 3 or so 1 line messages. Forced to select theme colours which give me eye strain the UI is now unintuitive and lacks settings to change things like text size and other options. Smacks of the devs talking in a meeting saying 'Look how much Snapchat is worth let's rip it off but do it really poorly'. You're not the only VOIP around now days skype if you don't fix this we can go elsewhere.
I need a dark theme just like the Windows 10 version. I actually have photophobia so I really need it.

review_text: I have always used this app and found it easy to navigate. No longer the case. As a visually impaired person I find the new version much less friendly and more difficult to navigate. No longer can you search flights between airports without a specific date which was useful if you didn't know what days flights to certain destinations where available. Pressing the back button now takes you back to the home page instead of the previous screen. Bring it back as it was this is awful.

review_text: as i'm a blind and visueally impaired person i find this app user friendly. example before recording my duet i have a option to listen to the song and if i'm not happ with my recordings i can deleet an record my song again. but the only thing that really disapoints me as i'm on the free option and not on vip i cant record my own solos start my own duets or group recordings unless i'm on vip. and altho i'd like to bee on vip i'm very corshis about giving my personal bank details

app_name: Smule: Sing Karaoke & Record Your Favorite Songs
review_text: This app is great a very enjoyable app overall. I'd even give this a rating of 4 or 5 if not only for a very annoying and disappointing issue that affects users like me and that is its accessibility with screen readers. I'm definitely contacting the developer about this. The app is useable but not fully. That is even with some effort from our part. 90 percent of the buttons are unlabeled the interfaces are cluttered when it comes to Talkback users and it is very hard to navigate. Your most recent updates include UI improvements well I hope in the next update you improve some more and please include us blind users in the things that you consider when you try to improve your app.

review_text: Hi team This app is cannot support to talkback It's have too accessibility bugs are there So all my blind cummunity people please don't install this app

app_name: Smule: Sing Karaoke & Record Your Favorite Songs
review_text: Smule app has worked nicely for me until 2021 New Year. Ever since the accessibility aspect concerning screen reader in mobiles has been reduced significantly. It stops speaking after you click to sing a duet invite. Nothing is recognisable on the screen which makes it annoying for Visually Challenged persons. I've observed this happening more in Samsung phones so I don't exactly know whether its the issue with the phone or the app. Requesting you to look into this and please fix the issue asap

app_name: Smule: Sing Karaoke & Record Your Favorite Songs
review_text: I am using smule from last 2 years. I recently change my mobile to Samsung m31s. As I am visually disable I used this application with talkback option. But now I'm facing issue on smule with talkback while recording mode. As I am visually challange not able to use smule without talkback. Request you to kindly fix this issue to operate smule with talkback. Wating for your positive revert and updates.

app_name: Smule: Sing Karaoke & Record Your Favorite Songs
review_text: I used smule since 2015 and i love it so much. But new updatw the font are too small for me because i have eyes vision problem i couldn't see the lyric like before. Can you ads setting for lyric? So everyone can choose small or big font for the lyric.

app_name: Smule: Sing Karaoke & Record Your Favorite Songs
review_text: Inaccessible for people with visual impairment! Thus not useful at all. Also not worthy for even 1 star who ignore inclusion.

app_name: Smule: Sing Karaoke & Record Your Favorite Songs
review_text: This app is an excellent app make it more user friendly for the visually challenged community

app_name: Smule: Sing Karaoke & Record Your Favorite Songs
review_text: Love this app it helps me deal with my stress especially being a visually impaired mum

The February update SUCKS. The new high contrast color scheme really messes with my astigmatism and makes it harder to read. I don't like how it changed the way to look at all my snap stories. I've been having problems with it crashing and closing out too with this new update. Can we just go back to the old Snapchat?
This is not blind accessible if it had a dark mode enable option and screen and screen enlargement tool then it would be a lot better
Give it a dark theme so I don't blind myself every night/morning checking it

Where do I begin. This is a horrible experience. So many features that are on ios take months to go to android. There's no dark mode so you'll go blind the moment it gets dark. And it's buggy as hell. It will crash about once a week and it's annoying. Such a bad experience

Please make it compatible with fullscreen gestures control. Everytime I swipe to go back it just cancels the back gestures with its own gesture and pops up keyboard. And a dark mode would be appreciated because I don't want to go blind when I open the app at night. But this will be ignored as every other complaint of this app. And you'll only focus on more ads.
add dark mode for Android plz I'm going blind due to how bright your app is
Dark mode is needed I'm tryna not go blind
Here is no any dark theme on snap chat and my eye are half blind because of these white theme

It's 2021 and still there's no dark mode..y'all gonna make us go blind soon :/

Just another app that decided 'lets make just about everything white' would be a great idea.. Some features are nice but one feature needed is a 'Night Time' or 'Dark' feature/theme so people don't blind themselves when they open up the app

I think it's just my phone tweaking out for Snapchat not working sometimes but y'all should make a night mode setting cause man oh man when it's dark and I open Snapchat even on the lowest setting I go blind so please help me not go blind that would be very much appreciated thank.

Bruh is snapchat of course is good but man this thing lets me blind bro put dark mode
it's a very good app but it should get the dark mode implemented cuz if I am opening it at night I'm going blind every time

God dammit it just add a dark mode to snap my eyes literally go blind everytime I open snapchat ugh
Where tf is the dark mode sorry i just dont wanna be blind so can i have dark mode man

NEVER GONNA GIVE DARK MODE TO ANDROID. I've come to turms with it. Other than that it's a great texting app my *2 app only cause I blind my eyes at night using it.
amazing app ive been using it for years all it is missing is a DARK MODE so people dont blind themselves with a bright white screen when checking snap late at night
Snapchat is an great app but if it had an dark mode that will be great because sometimes when its late the brightness is so light it makes me blind so i would like it to have an dark mode

It is a very nice clean app to talk with your friends with One thing I feel like they should add is a dark mode so phones don't blind the person from accidentally blasting the lighting also so percentage doesn't go down ass fast
Snapchats new update has made it inaccessible with the screen reader. My friends who are blind and low-vision (including myself) can no longer use the app. This is really disappointing.

I have been diagnosed with flash brightness because snapchat will not enable dark mode for Android. Thank you snapchat for causing my blindness. SNAPCHAT FOR ANDROID NEEDS DARK MODE. That needs to be fixed. I guess I will live the rest of my life with flashing vision. Do not recommend this app.

There no problem at all in this I love and always will no annoying lag and just the same....but their is one thing. Can we get back enable dark mode for android because it's hard to see at night can can cause blindness to other users. Other than that there are no problems. Keep it up

Can we get some color blindness settings please
DARK MODE FOR ANDROID pls just add that for Android i mean i just wanna snap at night without get eye Cancer...

I swear to god with every new update snapchat releases their design team makes me want to vomit more. This is singelhandedly the GROSSEST accessibility design I've ever seen. First of all what happened to the black background when you go to your profile page? the white is eye straining and they made it so busy it's like having an anyuersim each time you glance at the screen. you should make an option for a dark mode. secondly it's hard to edit anything now on your story.PLEASE FIX THESE ISSUES
They want people to beg in front of them to come up with update for dark mode. Really disgusting... always feel eye strain while using this app in night.
You could add a night mode. To reduce the eye strain from using your app at night. There's just far too much white background to look at 3am.

This app before a certain update was working a lot better than it is now n if am honest I'd prefer it back like with some video messages not sending r sayin that they r but don't show up ive had frequent crashes round every hr of me using the app whilst these issues needed addressing id like to address the absence of a dark mode... it helps with eye straining n battery conservation n the fact that many other apps have it shows the complete lack of care for this app

great app not gonna lie but i swear yall dont care about us android folks like ive been so ready to get dark mode its super annoying see all the people with iphones get dark mode when im up late getting eye strain and headaches

It used to be so much better :((( the new update is soooo bad! I suggest bringing back all the recent stories on the news page. It is so eye straining to have all the information shoved and crammed into one area. The old update was so much better! I wish I had never updated (
This is sn overall good map it just needs a dsrk mode the white is very eye straining
Waiting for the dark theme.Using snapchat in night is really eye straining !
When can yall add dark mode to android I'm pissed off everytime I get eye strain when I open snapchat to a white screen
It's good. It does everything it's supposed to do. But dark mode isn't a luxury. The next update needs to include dark mode for androids. Eye strain is a serious issue.

Uses so much battery! Also make a 'night mode' too! (Aka replace white pixels with black to help save battery and eye strain for amoled screens) Also Y'all should make it so it can save videos too not just screenshots of pics and make it more optimized per phone instead of a blanketed version for everyone Love app still though almost there
It's a pretty good app and it's pretty useful. My only input is to implement a dark mode option the white light can be a bit eye straining.
A night mode/black theme would really reduce eye strain! Just an idea 🙂

Hi Overall snapchat is very brilliant but i have one recommendation for betterment of snapchat i.e. Add dark mode or dark theme. It helps us to use snapchat in night . It also prevents us from eye straining . So kindly add this good thing in snapchat as soon as possible .

Everything is great and Snapchat is improving a lot with time but the only thing it hasn't improved is the apps compatibility with device's dark mode people now a days usually like to use dark mode all the time as its a bit less eye straining. WhatsApp Facebook and Instagram work perfectly in dark mode but Snapchat just can't decide the colour scheme bcz it doesn't have any dark mode. It's still white and now the text is also white now you can't see the names. Please introduce dark mode now.
Please Make it in Dark mode☺it will really help lot n reduce eye strains and eyes will not pain ☺🙏🏻
Love the app and use it more than I text. Would really appreciate a dark mode to reduce eye strain.

Does what it's supposed to send and recieve 'snaps' and delete them after viewing or 24 hours. However a dark mode feature for andraid like that of the iphone variant would be greatly appreciated those of us who prefer dark mode due to eye strain would benefit from such an implementation. Besides that the app is great. :)

Love the new updates that are coming out made the bottom bar dark mode you know there should be dark mode for the app itself because we all love to sit on snapchat for hours when laying down in bed and the bright app is making eye strain worse. if u made it dark mode you'd make millions and millions of people very very happy. just a suggestion though :)

Can't use because the bright/white background causes me extreme eyestrain that produces pain and nausea even with sunglasses on. Please add a dark theme (including a dark splash screen on app launch as well) in the next update. Update: can't be used without the Play Store. Useless app belongs in a garbage can.

The app is great for taking photos and sending snaps to everyone is awesome. But we need dark mode to reduce the eyestrain when we use the app. The entire background is bright white and it strains the eye a lot. We all request a dark mode in the upcoming update.

Snap Chat don't support 'Dark Mood' 😭 in Chat/Message the text contrast is not right. I have glaucoma so I use Dark Mood a lot! But I'm very sure a lot of people just use dark mode because it's Dope! Plus it's better for your eyes 👀. So can you please just fix it!? Thanks 👍
Its great I really like it but can you add a feature for people like me beacuse I have lazy eye and the face scanner reads my face wrong a lot of the time

To whom it may concern: When snapchat last updated (2/13/19) the most glaring change I noticed was that the user profile page that shows your own story and snapcode has been changed from black to white with no option to change it back. As an individual with light sensitivity problems this is a horrible change and unfortunately I'm not sure if I can continue to use the app. If there was even just the option to change it from 'day' to 'night' it would seriously make a world of difference. ❤

accessibility could use a little work. personally I have Epilepsy. so one of the things that is difficult for me with snapchat is that i have high light sensitivity. so flashing lights can cause me to have seizures. I've noticed there are some filters that have such flashing lights which without warning could be highly dangerous for people like me. Also recently I've noticed that in the memories section of snapchat any moving snap now flashes which can also be potentially dangerous.

The recent update has made the app constantly crash on my phone and when it works it is exceptionally slow and buggy. I have low vision and was adjusting to the familiar layout but the new layout makes it more complicated. Snapchat used to be fairly easy to access without aid I was finally getting the hang of it and now I'm the old grandma of my friends who doesn't know how to use it. Again. And apologize to Rihanna. Thanks.
completely inaccessible to people who are low vision or completely blind. it didn't work at all with TalkBack.
Make the app more accessible for people who use screen readers. So everyone can use it.

My rating will change if this app will become accessible for visually impaired people with their screen readers So that they also may be able to use this app smoothly My humble request to the developer please look into the matter
Alot of bugs screen flashes black on random occasions could be harmful to people with sensitive eyes. Random crashes. Sometimes it lags behind for no reason snaps pending randomly
Functionality is acceptable but Snapchat is the only platform that hasn't created a dark mode yet. Please make a dark mode for my sensitive eyes.
ADDD DARK MODE I HAVE OVER SENSITIVE EYES AND SUBSTRATUM DOESNT WORK FOR ONEPLUS 8 PRO
please allow our camera to be the default. its annoying having our pics blurred by the snapchat cam. also can you enable a night mode for sensitive eyes?

I'm a Samsung user and its very frustrating that there's no dark mode settings for android devices but when I use snapchat on my ipad there's dark mode. It's especially frustrating as I have sensitive eyes. Also other new updates like pinning chats don't work for android devices but definitely work for ios.

Honestly snap has been blinding for awhile. I have been told by people that I can turn snapchqt into dark mode to help with my sensitive eyesight but I have yet to figure out how to do that. If I can figure that out I will be happy to change it to 5 stars.

I updated it hoping the effects would work but instead I got blinded by a bright white light after every picture?? I have a screen dimmer and this is not good for users with sensitive eyes at all. Everything is fine par the sudden bright light upon taking a picture.
I think snapchat needs a dark mode for people who have sensitive eyes and whatnot.

Need to make a better experience for Android. Iphones are able to have a dark mode I'd like to have that as well. Also the backing up shouldn't take forever. I don't like rating things. I definitely don't like telling you it's not my favorite app because it is I use this app everyday but it would be nice to be able to have a dark mode so some of us with sensitive eyes don't blind ourselves.

It just started doing weird stuff sometimes the friends bitmojis don't show up i git it set to delete once I've read something but sometimes it shows me things I've already seen and it's bot letting me replay the pics or videos. It also should have a night mode the white screen is really annoying specially for those of us who have sensitive eyes.

I love the app but I would like to be able to pin my messages and to have dark mode. The light mode has become to bright for my sensitive eyes..but other than that everything seems to be great! I'm an android user!

I didnt love the new avatars there not very bitmoji ish they say more of a sims character. And also on the next update I would love to see the option of dark mode for android users. I have sensitive eyes and the light doesnt help it.
It's a fantastic app I just I think dark mode needs to come to android so people like me who have sensitive eyes don't always have to worry about being blinded every time we open up snapchat.

Amazing! But i want to add something... I wanna add darkmode .The reason for this is that I have sensitive eyes . When I put my screen all the way dark it just is still do bright for me . Please Snapchat see this and add darkmode .

Snapchat is a generally nice app I have no problem with most features. Only problem that exists is lack of a dark mode!!!!! The makers of the app really need to add a dark mode because I'm sure I'm not the only one with light sensitive eyes who gets problems when the app is open!!!

I love snapchat but two problems I have is that you cant get the dark mode for all phone types and snap keeps blocking me from adding certain people saying their account wasnt found but I can add it on. a different account. As for the dark mode I have light sensitive eyes and that would really help greatly if dark mode could be for all phone types and be easy to access . Other than that snap is really great.
i wish there would be a dark mode i have pretty sensitive eyes. also i'd like it if we could choose music from our own dowlands
I love this app but I'm on Samsung so I do not have dark mode. I have sensitive eyes so when I am on my phone at night my eyes get very sore and watery
Snapchat should add dark mode for andriod users some of us has sensitive eyes
PLEASE GET RID OF THE NEW UPDATE. EVERYONE HATES IT! Screen now looks cluttered and is more difficult to use. Less accessible especially for people with eyesight problems. Put it back

I When ever I try to use the new update features such as the video chat my screen goes really dark basically exits out of the video chat and the other person can hear me but just can't see me. I can't hear them because not only does the screen go basically black my speakers get really dull and can barely hear when they talk back so idk if this can be fixed I uninstalled and reinstalled twice now and restarted my phone!! Like the idea of the new update just wish it worked for me
worst app to use with Talkback
Please enable larger font in the text function for people with vision impairments. Other than that it's GREAT!
Don't forget your password if you have vision problems. You will never be able to pick the correct pictures and you can't zoom in.
If you have a visual disability this app won't work for you. There is no .feature to zoom in or change the font size. Other then that the app works .great
Very nice app but please make it accessable even the visually challenged can use it. If not camra but at least other things
New update absolutely sucks! Especially if you're visually impaired like myself. Please snapchat go back to the old platform!!

The new update is the worst update you have ever implemented، i am visually impaired the colors and everything was easier for me in the previous version but this version literally sucks. You are literally prioritizing the channels and advertisements over our friends stories which literally makes snapchat an advertisment apllication this is slowly becoming like facebook PLEASE bring back the old version FYI i turned off the auto update and the app still updated itself automatically without my permissions

I'm visually impaired and I would like to be able to use dark mode and a bigger font. I have friends who use this app more than others and I don't want to be a social outcast. Dear snap people why do I have to choose to be in pain over being a pariah? Is there some reason you won't allow dark mode? Is there something wrong with my device? Is there some secret feature that can allow me to save my eyes and not be blinded? Between the app and my eyesight why did I have to choose?

Snapchat doesn't support people who are Visually Impaired and Blind. I myself am Legally Blind. The white light that comes from the apps main white interface is harmful to my already limited vision with no way to turn it off.

I am a visually impaired user. I've had snapchat for a while but there has been many issues. With the latest update for some reason I don't know why but something was effected by it. Now whenever I press on someone's story all it says is 'Story loaded' or 'Story not loaded' if it's not loaded but doesn't speak to me the person's name. This is confusing because how am I supposed to find a specific story? for someone in my condition this is frustrating. My question for you is talk to?

I love the app but I'm visually impaired and my font enlargement app doesn't allow SC messaging to get bigger so I was wondering if you could make a feature to make the messaging bigger? All my friends know to make the pic font bugger already. Thanks! 5 stars if so!
this app would be perfect if you would just add dark mode for android please im begging my weak eyes cannot take it
No Dark Theme + Eye Strain = 1 Star. Reminds me of an old Corey Hart song. 'I wear my sunglasses at night... So I can so I can... Watch my SoundCloud app without gouging out my eyes!'

It's great and all but 1. The comments update is?? I can't tell what's a reply and what's just a comment. 2. I get the 'more vibrant cover art' thing but it just hurts my eyes. Tying back into the thing I said about the comments- tiny white text or bright album covers on a black background? It just doesn't work not in this context at least. The gray theme was perfect as it was no eyestrain easy to look at. 3. I've posted this review multiple times but it never actually went up? Hmm.

The app is completely crap with accessibility services like talk back. It's been like this forever and no matter how many times anyone says anything nothing ever gets done. And now with the latest updates everything got so much worse. If I had anything other than SoundCloud I would remove the app in a heartbeat. :( it once was so good... And now the support died.

Just installed the knew version of Soundcloud and I have to take back most of what I said before. Other than three unlabeled radio buttons in the login screen Talkback now sees everything that wasn't usable before. Nice work. :) I would give it a better rating but I can't seem to figure out how to change it on the Playstore webpage using VoiceOver in OS 10.
cannot scroll to the end of a playlist like in the apple version. accessibility issues with talkback.

I have astigmatism and have a hard time reading white text on a black background. It's a shame that this is not an option. I was trying to switch from Google Play Music to this but I cannot because my eyes can't handle it. Please enable users to change from dark mode this is extremely irritating.
It is not very intuitive and accessible for blind

app COULD be and SHOULD be awesome. Unfortunately there's no microphone to search with. I am legally blind and its SO painful typing one letter at a time. Searched Google for solution and apparently Spotify just doesn't care! That really sucks because I'd pay for the premium app!

I would give 5 stars but the voice search stopped working. My brother is legally blind and uses voice search on his apps. The voice commands were working well for him but then the app updated and it doesn't work anymore. I have tried to use it on my phone and it no longer works there either. I don't understand why you would do away with a feature that a large demographic would depend on like this.
I am a blind individual. Spotify is easy for me to use. I just need to have someone show me how to create a playlist.
Huge entertainment value especially through Google Home for someone who is legally blind and unable to manually operate a radio
The only thing that this program needs are the icons to be labeled with top back for the Google screen reader for blind people.

I am giving Spotify for Android a four-star rating because of this one reason. I am a blind Android operating system user and the latest few versions of Spotify have not been able to show the follow button when you want to follow an artist when you're using either talkback or voice assistant for Samsung devices. can we please get this fixed for all of us blind Spotify users Apple's product works just fine. Meaning the Spotify for iOS. Again please get this fixed and I will change my rating to 5

EXTREMELY complicated clumsy & all-around frustrating for Blind listeners using TalkBack (voice Assistant on Samsung). How appalling is this when visually impaired folks use audible entertainment apps ummm... 100% of the time?! 🤦🏻‍♀️
Please add a option for colour blindness people. In lyrics some colours(Red) blinding my eyes please do something for people like me

Really not happy with this app right now. It has recently been very buggy. Many tracks of my favorite artists do not work. I can't find a many tracks as I used to on search. Sometimes a font is used that is hard to read (double lined is hard on some of us with vision issues like blurry and double vision or cataracts.) The app is missing or won't play much or any the Ella Fitzgerald Collection for example. Why try to fix things that weren't broken? BUGGY like crazy now. Ugh! S21+. 5g.
New shortcut color yes. But that black unchangable background is very repelling and eye straining. Otherwise the app is cool though.

Music is good. Put all saved songs in playlist just in case it resets it will delete all of it. They said it was for security purposes when I bought a new phone. I hate the new shade of bright green. I liked when I could have a zero stress color scheme instead of this eye strain color green.
A good service which gives you a lot. The interface is easy to use and it is also screen reader accessible.

everything is fine on the content the only thing is the play button is not proper lable and in term of accessibility I can't find the play button which announce by screen reader(Google talkback) please fix the play button for accessibility issue.

Spotify has been very good good integration on hifi streaming equipment etc. However they've just taken away the Widget feature for Android phones. As a severely sight impaired user the widget is useful. please sack whoever's decided the removal of the widget was a good idea.

Great app. Possible. It's totally unsuitable for people with sight problems as light-on-dark scheme is impossible for us to work with. Please add themes which can be used by everyone. Thanks I have already voted for that idea and left a comment. BEFORE writing here. . May I also remind you that this anti-discriminatory idea which would really help with accessibility of you app stays at 'we don't think it's important' status for 6 years?

Hey just trying to use Spotify with Talkback when I'm not looking at the screen and none of the buttons are labelled. So buttons are just read as 'button 46' etc instead of button next track or button play/pause. It would help so much if this was updated.

Quite good for someone who needs to use Googles TalkBack accessibility feature however the navigation buttons such as 'play' and 'skip' need labeling. In general a great app with many playlists for any occasion. The app works fine on my tablet however when using it on my phone the app crashes every time the screen locks.

Finally Spotify works with Talkback! But what about the player in the app itself? Still lots of 'button 55' etc when naviagting the screen even the play button (button 2) and track back (button 63) / forward (button 41) buttons aren't labeled appropriately. Is the in app player the next to get some Talkback love? My home screen and navigation panel widget also developed temporary issues when testing with Talback straight after the update - the home screen app wouldn't open the app or display info about the current song. While the navigation panel widget wouldnt update track info when a track was changed. These seem to have rectified themswleves now.

I've listened to spotify daily for years I love downloading music for long car rides. I have vision problems and my hands shake. The update or whatever you guys did is going to cause me to find another streaming system. the player is now tiny and in the lower left corner. I turn my tablet sideways it doesnt help. Please make an accessibility feature or fix it back I dont want to change streaming service.

Since the update 1. Spotify app doesn't read the native system settings (like it used to b4) meaning anyone who sets accessibility features won't get them for example setting font to an accessible size locally for the visually Impaired. Support dont understand they think I want to change fonts within Spotify. I don't. Just want it to read accessibility options set. 2. The font size is ridiculously small making it look amateurish. ensuring anyone with visual problems Inc glasses can't read it.

Needs more genre radio stations (see Slacker). Needs a light theme also for those that have are visually impaired. Needs a option for where to store offline music (pretty basic guys your competitors have had it for quite a long time). Like the service a lot but the dark only theme is driving me to someone else soon.

Let me have my little microphone button back ! ... And make it easier for the visually impaired To use YOU jackasses And some real person technical support Would-be nice too . Instead of a bunch of computers and servers pretty much running the show . Other than that and some Billing issues it's really pretty good . 😎😎😎😎
Great app. Just too sensitive for typos. An improvenment in this area will improve the experience of the visually impaired like myself.
Needs features for visually impaired people ie font size and customising features
not bad. I find it somewhat difficult to use being visually impaired.

As a visually impaired user I find it difficult to navigate some of the options. For example you used to be able to long press on a song to add it to the queue which was far easier than having to navigate the small menu in the right hand side of the song. It would be good if you could reintroduce the long press feature. Otherwise great app.

app_name: Swiggy : Food Delivery | Instamart Grocery | Genie
review_text: I would rate the app the lowest as it is one of the most inaccessible and non-inclusive app for people with disabilities. I was a regular user of Swiggy and could manage my daily food needs using my screen reader until it got worse. I had to uninstall it eventually. with every new releases the Swiggy leadership product design and app development teams consistently ignored the needs of users with disabilities in spite of requests and today it is completely unusable by screen reader users like me. COVID has hit hard the vulnerable groups like people with disabilities and home delivery is the only safe option for blind who have difficulty following physical distancing. Instead of making the app accessible and make life safer who needs the most especially in these times Swiggy you have unfortunately chosen to exclude by not complying with legally mandated accessibility guidelines. I do hope you include accessibility right from design phase and ensure it is factored in every release. It’s not just your legal and social responsibility but also a business opportunity. It just requires you to train relevant people on inclusion of users with disabilities and on adopting accessibility guidelines meant for apps. Till then I will continue to voice your non-inclusive practice.

app_name: Swiggy : Food Delivery | Instamart Grocery | Genie
review_text: After I posted a review of the app here I got a great response from the Swiggy team. It is so heartening to read the 'Whats's New' section of the latest update. It is great that the Swiggy team acknowledged the accessibility issues with the app and then set out to correct the same. That effort is to be greatly appreciated. After the most recent update it is now possible for a TalkBack user to order food on Swiggy. Not like the old way but using the Actions option from the TalkBack menu after focusing on a particular item. The entire menu will still not be available but on doubletapping the 'Recommended Item the next category will become available tapping on that will present the next and so on. Not ideal but functional. The positive approach of the Swiggy team indicates that they will take seriously the issue with the menu option not being TalkBack accessible even now. The menu option at the bottom of the screen is not even recognized by TalkBack. Hope with the next update they will get that sorted. The effort and commitment of the team deserves 5 stars. The end product is not quite there. So only a 4 star overall at this point.

app_name: Swiggy : Food Delivery | Instamart Grocery | Genie
review_text: You guys have done better in terms of accessibility. But using with talkback in the past order section we are not able to know what was the orter and what was the cost until unless we click on it. As we were able to know earlier. Talkback pronounces only 'past order history list item.' Please look in to this matter.

app_name: Swiggy : Food Delivery | Instamart Grocery | Genie
review_text: We hear you and have been working to make the app more accessible for users with physical impairments. With this update we have hit the first milestone in the journey to equal access: - Food ordering is now accessible for vision and motion impaired users with the talkback feature - Motion impaired users can now navigate and place orders using external switch access devices There’s much more in store vis-à-vis making Swiggy more inclusive and we’ll have updates to share in subsequent releases!

Hello I’m totally blind and I’m very happy to see that you have made Telegram accessible for us. I have found some problems in Telegram accessibility. Please fix them if it’s possible. 1. Self-destruct timer field is not supported by Talkback. 2. There are many unlabeled buttons for the blind. For example when your search for a specific word or number on a channel group or chat is done there are three buttons at the bottom of screen which cannot be announced their names by Talkback. Please label these buttons and all other buttons like these. 3. the ability “edit options” in Talkback does not work in Telegram. This ability helps blind people to edit a text simply. For example select a partial of the text cut copy paste and so on. for activating this ability you have to move the cursor in editbox and swipe your finger up then right to open local context menu. Now you can see “Edit options” and click on it.

Ok...when the app first updated with the new revamp I couldn't use it because it kept stopping. Idk why but I solved that problem by simply reinstalling it. And before I did that .. I went through here reading a bunch of the latest reviews which most all of them were not good. A lot of people are disappointed in the new design and complaining about it and after reading all that... I thought it was going to be so awful and this huge mess of an app that was really complicated and have a blinding white light as people had described..etc...Then when I finally logged into it to check it out for myself... I was pleasantly surprised actually! It wasn't that bad at all! It's not that much different! I was thinking...what are all these people complaining about this so much for? Because you have to tap on the things now to open them? Big whoop! Everyone is entitled to their own likes and opinions of course and I don't mean any disrespect to anyone here but There's nothing wrong with this app! The old version was great too. It didn't need to be changed but everyone is being a little ridiculous and over dramatic about this one! It's not that hard to navigate through at all in my opinion! And if the light is too bright for those with more sensitive eyes then why don't you try turning down the light on your phones then? I certainly wouldn't oppose to maybe adding some different color schemes though and maybe allow users to choose their own color preferences?

It was a good app until 4.02. Many bad design choices vs the prev version: - overall poor screen real-estate utilization (lots of wasted space) requires excessive scrolling - no way to pin day’s details to stay on screen must tap to see - no way to see a concise extended forecast summary - no customization or turn off for lame backgrounds - cartoonish design reminds old desk phones with huge buttons for people with vision impairments Quite a regression from the prev version. Unless redesigned - this downgrade is an opportunity for competition to step in and for customers to pick a more practical/usable app.

While the abilities to add an image to a text post or change the font thereof are appreciated there are still a number of functionality and useability issues that have yet to be resolved and/or have arisen with this new mobile update. 1. The search function still turns up no results on my own blogs regardless of whether the search bar's content is correctly typed. This error has been present for at least three updates. 2. Please put the tabs bar back on the top of the screen - or add a function for individual users to choose whether it's on the top or the bottom of the screen. This change implemented in the previous update was not only unnecessary and pointless but also unexpected thereby causing many users (myself included) to experience mental distress. Your userbase is made up of an overwhelmingly large number of people with mental illnesses. These mental illnesses can sometimes be caused to flare when the person is exposed to a sudden and unexpected change. 3. The new blue bubble around tags being typed is distracting at best and a major accessibility issue at worst. For those with vision problems the blue bubble may make it impossible to proofread the text within regardless of the color of said text. 4. The fact that tags being typed may be cut off by an ellipsis makes proofreading difficult even for those with healthy eyesight and even more so for those with memory issues (such as myself and several of my friends who also use this app). 5. The clickable area for adding tags to a post is now smaller. This makes tagging less accessible to those with vision problems and/or poor fine-motor control. The previous interface which provided a long bar as the clickable area was much more accessible. 6. It now takes more steps to create tag and choose the posting time of both new posts and reblogs. The previous interface was much more efficient and user-friendly. 7. While the new ability to read every tag on a post without scrolling is appreciated the 'See All' command often does not show all proceeding tags. It often cuts out proceeding tags that are shorter than three words each. 8. This final note is more of a personal preference but the personal preferences of your userbase are still things you should take into consideration when formulating an update. A return of the full-page list of a user's blogs/sideblogs from which said user could access any of their blogs or blogs' settings they needed to would be highly appreciated. Thank you for your time.

app_name: TuneIn Radio: News- Sports & AM FM Music Stations
review_text: Used to be one of my favorite apps. at its best the interface was simple offered a wide range of radio stations a simple and effective search interface and so on. However with the recent updates one of the most cherished features has taken a bad hit. That is the accessibility of the pp. It used to be an app that worked well with TalkBack Google's built-in ScreenReader available in accessibility options. Now there are more buttons that not labeled fields that TalkBack can't read and the app often freezes when used along with TalkBack. Hope these concerns would be addressed soon and the interface would be fully accessible for visually impaired users also.

app_name: TuneIn Radio: News- Sports & AM FM Music Stations

I've been using Twitter for Android since last year and I'm glad to see that for the most part the app is very accessible with the TalkBack screenreader for blind and visually impaired users like myself. I have noticed however that there are a couple of bugs which need to be addressed and squashed. Firstly when reading direct messages (especially longer DM's) TalkBack doesn't read the message in its entirety. Instead it reads a couple of sentences or lines after which it refreshes and reads again from the beginning of said message. In some cases the TalkBack focus moves to an earlier or later message as it is reading a specific one within that specific conversation window. Also in the Home tab TalkBack doesn't focus on the first tweet on my timeline and I have to scroll all the way up until I find it. I'm very disappointed to see that these two issues have not been fixed in the latest update! Please fix!
