As a Wattpad user for over five years I can fully say it used to be the .best a for reading writing and reviewing books: key phrase being used to .be. Running Issues: 1) TOO MANY ADS- I fully support Wattpad having ads in .order to support the creators of this app but having to watch a 30s video .every other chapter is ridiculous. 2) POOR PUBLISHING- This one they seemed .to have fixed but it can still be a problem. Sometimes a user can publish .a story but it doesn't actually publish it or it doesn't show everything .the author wrote to the author. (i.e. the author writes some then comes .back and writes more later. The stuff written later won't show to the .author in the published chapter in reader mode but it will show for other .readers.) Also chapters often have “revision issues” not allowing it to be .published. Sometimes I have this issue 4-5 times to publish a chapter .other times it's not a problem. 3) MESSAGE BOARD- Message board (where one .can pm others) is often down and doesn't send messages through always and .it doesn't always update if new messages are received. 4) POOR CUSTOMER .SERVICE- Wattpad help is where you can message a bot and then message the .support team if there is an issue however the bots are next to useless. .With limited dialogue they can understand they often just pick out words .they know and decide what you clearly should be asking. As for messaging .support It only appears as on the actual site not app and I have tried .this only to find no message actually goes through. Overall I rate 3 stars .only because I loved it so much-it really deserves one or maybe two. It has .become a disappointment. All four of these issues have exist for at least 6 .months and have not been fixed in any updates. I was tempted to upgrade to .Wattpad premium but I'm not willing to pay money for a glitchy app with no .customer service.

The app started off great but recently they've been changing the look and feel of the app for example they had an option to read the books with a black background which helps with my vision issues making it easier on my eyes to read but they changed that so now it's a weird grey color. They added an offline reading option which is cool but now if you were reading a book and close the app you have to scroll through all the books saved in offline to try and find your recent reads.

Wish this app was more disabled friendly. The visually impaired also like to read. if you can add in an audible option when reading i will give you 5 stars. but untill you become disabled friendly you will remain at 1 star.
I would appreciate larger font settings since I'm visually impaired and I'm struggling to read as of late (my enlarged font app does not want to work on it anymore)

Negatives: The Wattpad stars and Paid Stories authors need a grammar and spell checker. I have to write my stories in Microsoft Word website and app keeps on saying 'you've had a previous version. Keep?' after every word. Not able to find proper multilingual stories I have to use the 'translator setting' which poorly translates to English... Positives: Dark mode. Font size can enlarge. Font can be changed to aid dyslexics or the visually impaired (during reading but not anywhere else).

I think it would be good to have a text reading function. Like a voice reading it aloud. That would make it inclusive to the visually impaired and so people can multitask whilst still enjoying the stories
Needs to be an audio function for the visually impaired and those on the go.

app_name: Waze - GPS- Maps- Traffic Alerts & Live Navigation
review_text: I haven't needed the app for a couple of months...but when I do I love it! Particularly at night. Astigmatism turns headlights into giant blazing stars for me so this sweet app sees much better than I in dark and less than familiar places. LOVE getting real time traffic/hazard/roadwork updates. And so far I haven't been able to fry it with chronic choice changes for multiple new side-routes and stops along the way... I REALLY like that.

app_name: Waze - GPS- Maps- Traffic Alerts & Live Navigation
review_text: Subpar Android Auto Support has issues getting GPS position while in call. Night mode broke recently so it tires to blind you while driving have voice notification just say: 'in 900 meters' with no instructions on what to do. And lags about 50-100m behind the actual position.

app_name: Waze - GPS- Maps- Traffic Alerts & Live Navigation
review_text: Please label all the button so that it will bee easier for the blind user to use this app.

app_name: Waze - GPS- Maps- Traffic Alerts & Live Navigation
review_text: kindl make this application accessible for blind users

app_name: Waze - GPS- Maps- Traffic Alerts & Live Navigation
review_text: Need traffic colors in gray scale for the color blind

app_name: Waze - GPS- Maps- Traffic Alerts & Live Navigation
review_text: Great real time traffic. However not very color blind friendly

app_name: Waze - GPS- Maps- Traffic Alerts & Live Navigation
review_text: Vehicle purpose apps should consider not to blind the driver at night driving. ACCIDENTS WILL HAPPEN - CAUSED BY THE APP! Is it okay? Startup should be a dark screen. Menus should be dark. The map also should initialize in dark mode - after that the app can take the time to recognize if there is daylight or not. One more... I would welcome a much bigger speedometer. And somebody should read user ratings sometimes...

app_name: Waze - GPS- Maps- Traffic Alerts & Live Navigation
review_text: Waze sometimes is not accessible and the app sometimes doesn't provide the correct street names. It kinda fails when out of Metromanila or in new developments it cannot seem to identify the landmarks or streets. I have to resort to Google maps instead. Sometimes the alerts for certain streets are not updated. So I end up driving blind trying to find another way to my destination. Pls fix that. It gets frustraing enough to make want to delete this app. Thanks.

app_name: Waze - GPS- Maps- Traffic Alerts & Live Navigation
review_text: Great app. Can u make a simpler theme where the only route to drive is yellow and the rest is blue or red? That be easier to see for those that are partially color blind like myself. Thanks

app_name: Waze - GPS- Maps- Traffic Alerts & Live Navigation
review_text: I am a blind user of your application and I rely on a screen reader. This application is no labels buttons. Many controls are not lately. I would urge that this applications buttons all be labeled and that work be made to make this application accessible to all users.

app_name: Waze - GPS- Maps- Traffic Alerts & Live Navigation
review_text: Please make this app accessible for blind people. I heard this app announce the name of the place and its distance through text to speech. I am a talkback user and I tried navigating the app and it needs some improvement. This app can be use to visually impaired people like me who wants to travel on their own. Hope developer will see this post. This app is awesome

app_name: Waze - GPS- Maps- Traffic Alerts & Live Navigation
review_text: Got me outta hard spots plenty o times.. Recently after the new update the one that i installed in my galaxy tab 7 plus cant show the highlighted route and for me the new update makes me harder to see the details of the road (i have partial colorblindness) the old version is much better for me..

app_name: Waze - GPS- Maps- Traffic Alerts & Live Navigation
review_text: Update: Was 5 stars. Not a fan of the version 4 changes. The comic animations are cute but the interface changes have me spending more time looking at the screen to do anything (instead of the road). Removing the ability to report issues on the other side of the road was foolish and cutting down color palettes from many to two neither of which are color-blind friendly was equally foolish. I like change when change is productive but this is a step backward.

app_name: Waze - GPS- Maps- Traffic Alerts & Live Navigation
review_text: The main reason I use this over Google maps is it shows the speed limits but the graphic is tiny and I can barely see it with my old eyes.. Please make an option to increase the size of the graphic..

app_name: Waze - GPS- Maps- Traffic Alerts & Live Navigation
review_text: My sis turned me on to this program. Only wished it had bigger icons for my 50 year old eyes & automatically returned to the map after updating gas prices.

app_name: Waze - GPS- Maps- Traffic Alerts & Live Navigation
review_text: the most accurate eta's and route choices out of any navigation software I've ever used. The look is a bit candyland for my taste and the primary information fonts a bit small for my old eyes but who cares with such on the mark calculations.

app_name: Waze - GPS- Maps- Traffic Alerts & Live Navigation
review_text: The ONLY thing that 'might' bother somebody is when they ask if you've seen a certain business advertisement. Those questions are in tiny white letters on light blue backgrounds... totally unreadable to my 62 year old eyes. Otherwise... an absolutely 'must have' app! I love it. I use it every day for over 50 hours a week. Only 300 megs used in a month!

app_name: Waze - GPS- Maps- Traffic Alerts & Live Navigation
review_text: I've been using Waze for Postmates and similar delivery apps for a while now. It's definitely fast and having other users warn about police officers traffic and gas prices is very helpful. I would say my only problem with this app is the aesthetics. There are not many options to customize how the map looks. I'm colorblind (protanopia) and it can at times be hard to distinguish between different path/road colors. I wish there were settings to fix this. I also am not personally a fan of the cute cartoony style but that's just me.

app_name: Waze - GPS- Maps- Traffic Alerts & Live Navigation
review_text: This app need some major work for those of us who used talk back on a daily basis. We cannot figure out what the buttons do because they are not labeled. We can also not go into our settings within the app to change different things such as our voices. Please fix this asap.

app_name: Waze - GPS- Maps- Traffic Alerts & Live Navigation
review_text: Will you please kindly consider modifying this app so that user interface elements make more sense when read out by Google[s Talkback service? If you'd like you are welcome to contact me personally. My name as you can see is Brandon Miller and I should be in your company database somewhere.

app_name: Weather by WeatherBug: Live Radar Map & Forecast

app_name: Weather by WeatherBug: Live Radar Map & Forecast
review_text: Great app 👍. I have used WeatherBug for several years now. It is an awesome weather. I am legally blind. Very easy for me to use with my low vision. You can't go wrong! 😁

app_name: Weather by WeatherBug: Live Radar Map & Forecast
review_text: Find it to be easy to navigate. My old eyes have difficulty with the extremely small writting though.

app_name: Weather by WeatherBug: Live Radar Map & Forecast
review_text: EVO 4G LTE. I've tried all the rest and I like the detailed information and changeable background so that I can see all the text.(white text over a bright moon difficult for my old eyes). Occasional lag on current location when on the move but no big deal it always catches up.

app_name: Weather by WeatherBug: Live Radar Map & Forecast
review_text: I love the hour-by-hour forecasts based on local weather conditions not a national station. I wish the temp on the main screen was a larger font and had more color options. My old eyes can't see it without glasses.

app_name: Weather by WeatherBug: Live Radar Map & Forecast
review_text: Have had this 1 app on my phones from the start. From the time apps were made for cell phones. Why change when it works. Very well put together. Easy to understand and am able to read even with my old eyes😆

app_name: Weather by WeatherBug: Live Radar Map & Forecast
review_text: I like the fonts and layout. It seems really easy for my old eyes to pick up the text. I also like that the ads seem less obtrusive but I definitely see them. And the big one one observation to rule them all: it loads. I can read about the weather before it's over. One of the other sites is more like the history channel because by the time the thing loads the event is over. Also this site seems to center on the weather and not silly political opinion/indoctrination pieces. Good

app_name: Weather by WeatherBug: Live Radar Map & Forecast
review_text: Not so blinding for those of us with light sensitive eyes.

app_name: Weather by WeatherBug: Live Radar Map & Forecast
review_text: Still my favorite seather app but some talkback stability features should be put in.

app_name: Weather by WeatherBug: Live Radar Map & Forecast
review_text: It works well. I have vision issues so I wish the various pages had different colored backgrounds so I had a visual cue for each page of info.

app_name: Weather by WeatherBug: Live Radar Map & Forecast
review_text: I like the new look but give us the ability to change the background color and font size. The current ones make it very hard to read especially for those of is with vision problems.

Detects my location automatically no searching and setting up my city. No eye strain. Large clear numbers and letters make the screen easy to read which is extremely important to me. Lots of ads but you can expect that with everything these days.
Tells me the particular things I want to know. Compared to roommate's .weather app this is more accurate. Also looks nice and easy to see for .old eyes.

Hi! This app is great! Always accurate and up to the minute. It's give full information in detail. Very easy on the eyes which is important to me because of my visual impairment. And it's free! Thank you for making a excellent product!

I am visually impaired so this app helps me read the precious words. Feature filled easy to follow.

Everything about this app is great. I'm visually impaired and able to blow up the letters and change the background color so I can see and read in any light even darkness. Plus it reads it to me as well. I also love all the devotionals I start my day off with.
I like the new look of the home page but wish the books of the Bible were larger for the visually impaired.

I have never come across anything to do with the Bible that was this comprehensive. It is truly amazing to be able to switch versions easily and always find help at your fingertips. I want to learn how to use the bookmarks and highlights. I have never found anything that's interesting. I highly recommend this app. It should be noted it is easily used by the visually impaired. The app is great. I only have one major flaw that's why I'm giving it three stars. I'm blind and I use a screen reader most of the buttons are unlabeled so therefore I can't use it to get ringtones and I have to use a website which is very not fair. Please. Fix this issue.

Have loved this app ever since I came to use Android. Thanks for providing an experience where it is easy and simple to obtain super unique and awesome customisations for our phone. One little question though this app used to be accessible with Google TalkBack for blind users. Now there's a few glitches could you please fix thanks

I love this APP!!! I love all of the endless amount of free ring tones and notification sounds. You can find just about anything you want and looking for even like the great selection on the wall papers. I give this APP a '5-Star' rating and I strongly reccomend this APP especially to the blind. APP works well with 'Google Talkback.' Verry accessible to blind users. APP also has a friendly layout and is easy to navigate.
Easy to use by the visually impaired and blind thank you

With a bit of extra personalization such as full theme control with [drag&drop?] action button placement button orientation plus real time visible rating for items and a few other customization options full control to make the app tailored for ability to acquire/quick creation/ implement & even share items could top out the potential for this great app. Having the hud control to make my experience tailored for my needs is worth the time spent setting it up if it must be done via geometric coordinate mapping with quadrant alignment instead of drag & drop [assuming the viewable screen display is provided though not restricting placement for say a 3 square button to take up 1 spot at the scrn edge with scrolling marquee text or that all buttons be resizable down to 5pt font with available screen graph size allocated to xy:3590 or similar]. Color control inversion and color blindness options are a major bonus for those with visual impairment difficulties granted you can't please everyone but abilities we have available that are not implemented is a bit of a let down. All that being said keep up the good work! I've used this app off and on for quite a few devices and the only restrictions for the dl db are items yet to be uploaded by the user base.
It is my favorite app. Since my cataracts is so bad I can now hear who is calling. Love it!!!

On the whole the app isn't bad. Downloading a selected tone is self explanatory once the button is located. However it is difficult to search for specific types of tones. Furthermore the app needs drastic improvements in fairness for screen reader users. Unlabelled buttons and ads with exit buttons not shown by the screen reader make the app incredibly invasive and difficult to negotiate.

Love the great variety and number of ring- and text tones available. Not so fond of the fact that buttons are not labeled in a manner recognizable to my screen reader leaving me to figure them out by trial and error.
not supported with screen reader like talkback

I have downloaded and used this app. it helps in setting ringtones and wallpapers but it is far from accessible for screen readers like TalkBack. it could have been made more accessible with screen readers and should have had more relevant search options. Had this been more accessible I would definitely love rating 5.
just an awesome app but it could use some work with the TalkBack screen reader. a lot of the buttons are unlabeled I'm not sure what I'm doing.

If the developers actually read these ratings then I'll change my rating accordingly. I have 2 main gripes with the app. First it locks up on the auto update wallpaper settings about every 36 hours.
